query:
ALTER TABLE deliveries 
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('scheduled', 'loaded', 'en_route', 'arrived', 'delivered', 'returning', 'completed', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'scheduled' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS gpsLocation VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deliveryPhotos TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS estimatedArrival INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS actualArrivalTime INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS actualDeliveryTime INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS driverNotes TEXT;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deliveryPhotos TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS estimatedArrival INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS actualArrivalTime INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS actualDeliveryTime INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS driverNotes TEXT;
